title: One Bert Show Member Wants To Breakup Up With Their Friend...For Good Reason!
description:
Our audio producer K. Lee was recently put in a sticky situation with a group of his friends. What was supposed to be a peaceful day at the pool, quickly turned sideways when his friend got into an argument with the lifeguard! 
K. Lee explains what went down...
